configuration.additionalparam:
-license ${docflex-home}/docflex-javadoc-full.license
-template ${docflex-home}/templates/javadocPro/FramedDoc.tpl
-p:windowTitle "JasperServer API 8.2.0" -p:docTitle "JasperServer API 8.2.0"
-p:gen.deprecatedList true
-p:filter.byAnns.include.classes com.jaspersoft.jasperserver.api.JasperServerAPI
-p:include.emptyPackages false
-p:omit.inheritedMemberLists.for java.lang.
-format HTML
-nodialog
-launchviewer=false
-d /opt/jenkins/workspace/JRS_release-8.2.0/jasperserver-ce/jasperserver/jasperserver-war/target/site/public-api
configuration.name: JasperServer Public API

tasks.echo: COMMENT: About to call: ant build.xml for jasperserver war
